ctl:test.name: wcs2:get-kvp-req3
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Req3:In the WCS 2.0 get kvp requests, keys shall be case insensitive, values shall be case sensitive.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a getCapabilities request in lower case keys, and the result should contain a wcs:Capabilities.
[FAILURE] Send a getCapabilities request in upper case keys, and the result should contain a wcs:Capabilities.
[FAILURE] Send a getCapabilities request in mixed case keys, and the result should contain a wcs:Capabilities.
[FAILURE] Send a DescribeCoverage request in lower case keys, and the result should contain a wcs:CoverageDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a DescribeCoverage request in upper case keys, and the result should contain a wcs:CoverageDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a DescribeCoverage request in mixed case keys, and the result should contain a wcs:CoverageDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a getCoverage request in lower case keys, and the result should not contain an ows:Exception.
[FAILURE] Send a getCoverage request in upper case keys, and the result should not contain an ows:Exception.
[FAILURE] Send a getCoverage request in mixed case keys, and the result should not contain an ows:Exception.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: the server does not support the gml coverage.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a getCapabilities request with different case in values, and the result should contain an ows:Exception.

[FAILURE] Send a getCoverage request with different case in values, and the result should contain an ows:Exception.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: the server does not support the gml coverage.
